arts.ttl: PSG Urged to Drop Interest in Chelsea and Tottenham Target to Bolster No. 9 Position
arts.sum: Sporting Lisbon’s Viktor Gyökeres has been attracting much attention, especially with how he started the 2024-25 season. Several clubs could be looking to address their goal-scoring concerns by making a move for him next year. However, one journalist suggests that Paris Saint-Germain shouldn’t be on that list. arts.ttl: PSG Was Ready to Make Huge Bid for Barcelona Sensation, Journalist Reveals
arts.sum: This summer, rumors swirled about Paris Saint-Germain eyeing Lamine Yamal as a potential successor to Kylian Mbappé. Recently, a journalist revealed that the French club was ready to offer €200M for him, but ultimately, the deal didn’t materialize. arts.ttl: Enrique: Don't expect Dembélé to fill Mbappé void
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain coach Luis Enrique has been cautious about tipping Ousmane Dembélé as his team's next top scorer, saying it could be detrimental to his side.

arts.ttl: Newcastle Joins Arsenal and Liverpool in Race for PSG’s Summer Target
arts.sum: Late in the summer transfer window, Paris Saint-Germain was linked to Atalanta forward Ademola Lookman. Nonetheless, it appears Premier League clubs are keen on the 26-year-old forward. As the transfer window drew to a close, Lookman was linked with several top clubs, including PSG, Arsenal, and Liverpool, who were all reportedly interested in the 26-year-old. arts.ttl: Liverpool, PSG Summer Target Set to Extend Contract with Lyon, Report Says
arts.sum: Rayan Cherki of Olympique Lyonnais was in the transfer rumor mill this past summer as he was linked to Paris Saint-Germain, Liverpool, and Tottenham Hotspur. Despite the rumors of an exit, the Frenchman has opted to remain with Les Gones. Last month, L’Equipe reported that Cherki hoped that PSG would reignite their interest in him. arts.ttl: French leader PSG drops its first points after 1-1 at Reims
arts.sum: Elsewhere, forward M’Bala Nzola scored six minutes into stoppage time to earn Lens a 1-1 draw at Rennes. Unbeaten Marseille can move level on points with PSG if it wins at bitter rival Lyon on Sunday.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Reims 1-1 PSG: Ousmane Dembélé rescues league leaders’ unbeaten start
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Round 5, 21/09/24 Paris Saint-Germain dropped points on the road as they came from behind to draw 1-1 with Stade de Reims at the Stade Auguste Delaune. …

arts.ttl: ‘Too Good to Miss’ – Real Madrid Could Drop PSG Star in Favor of Liverpool Sensation
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain might be feeling some relief as Real Madrid appear to be shifting their focus away from Achraf Hakimi for their right-back position. Back in June, Mario Cortegana from The Athletic reported that Real Madrid was eyeing Hakimi as a potential successor to Dani Carvajal. arts.ttl: Adrien Rabiot aiming to be fully fit for Marseille’s clash with PSG
arts.sum: Adrien Rabiot (29) will be unlikely to feature in Olympique de Marseille’s clash with Olympique Lyonnais on Sunday evening. The France international who left Juventus at the start of July…
